last_episode_to_air.name: Episode 10
last_episode_to_air.overview: Singing, speeches and stories galore! Join everyone from Elton John to Brad Pitt, and Nicola Sturgeon to Alex Salmond for this Christmas cracker of a show.

name: Spitting Image
overview: The weekly puppet-based sketch show that skewers the politicians and celebrities who need it the most. With a cast of characters from Britain, America, and around the world, no one is safe from a satirical roasting.

episodes.name: Episode 1
episodes.overview: In the first episode, we find out how Donald Trump got coronavirus, deep dive into the presidential debate and see what Prince Andrew has to say for himself.

episodes.name: Episode 2
episodes.overview: Elon Musk reviews his latest projects and receives a message from his future self; Donald Trump beats coronavirus; and Greta Thunberg discovers football.

episodes.name: Episode 3
episodes.overview: Prince Harry meets his new neighbour, LeBron James; Dominic Cummings discovers the North; and Donald Trump learns of an escalating situation on the China-India border.

episodes.name: Episode 4
episodes.overview: This week Michael Gove visits Paris and Boris Johnson holidays in Scotland. Meanwhile, the American Presidential Election campaign is hotting up, despite Joe Biden's faux pas, and Ivanka Trump seeks to secure peace between India and China.

episodes.name: US Election Special (Part 1)
episodes.overview: President Donald Trump investigates mail-in vote fraud in an attempt to secure his re-election to office. Meanwhile, Elon Musk and Jeff Bezos race each other to Mars, and Michael Gove joins forces with Dominic Cummings.

episodes.name: US Election Special (Part 2)
episodes.overview: Bezos and Musk are beaten to Mars by Richard Branson, and Greta Thunberg discovers the thrill of the Fast & Furious films. In the American election race, Donald Trump has to appoint a new judge, and Joe Biden visits a diner in Nebraska.

episodes.name: Episode 7
episodes.overview: Charles takes over the Firm, Donald Trump refuses to give up the Presidential race and Dominic Cummings learns of Bonfire Night.

episodes.name: Episode 8
episodes.overview: The Illuminati meets with Joe Biden while Kanye West starts a new business venture and James Corden hangs out with Tiger Woods.

episodes.name: Episode 9
episodes.overview: RuPaul helps the Pope choose his successor and Boris Johnson returns to his brainless self after Dominic Cummings removes the brilliant ideas that he planted.

episodes.name: Episode 10
episodes.overview: President Trump’s welcome for Joe Biden backfires, Taylor Swift tries to win the biggest Christmas tree competition and Boris Johnson confronts Priti Patel about bullying.

episodes.name: Episode 1
episodes.overview: Cristiano Ronaldo returns to Manchester, but is his heart still in it? ABBA return with a new tour and the Coronavirus is planning his next career move.

episodes.name: Episode 2
episodes.overview: Joe Biden chats to some aliens and Greta Thunberg meets Malala Yousafzai.

episodes.name: Episode 3
episodes.overview: The Queen and Bill Gates hit it off on a First Date, and Nicky Minaj has a question for Chris Whitty.

episodes.name: Episode 4
episodes.overview: Boris and the Tory cabinet attempt to solve Britain’s fuel (and chicken) crisis.

episodes.name: Episode 5
episodes.overview: Boris is planning the Tory party conference and Ed Sheeran is under pressure to deliver his next album.

episodes.name: Episode 6
episodes.overview: Kanye West comes face-to-face with Xi Jinping and Prince Harry sends Tom Cruise on a new mission. As William Shatner goes into space, Boris Johnson goes on holiday and Dominic Raab meets The Queen.

episodes.name: Episode 7
episodes.overview: Daniel Craig goes to the pub, Boris tells a Bedtime Tale, and Jeff Bezos entices Zuckerberg, Branson and Musk deep into the Amazon jungle. Piers Morgan channels Stan in writing to Meghan Markle.

episodes.name: Episode 8 - Halloween
episodes.overview: Dishy Rishi commends his sexy budget to the House. A serial killer strikes at Elton John’s star-studded Halloween party, and COP26 gets under way in Glasgow. In Downing Street, Michael Gove summons Dominic Cummings, whilst Mark Zuckerberg goes hunting.

episodes.name: Episode 9
episodes.overview: Boris Johnson and Emmanuel Macron take part in scallop-gate and it all kicks off between Oprah and Meghan.

episodes.name: Episode 10
episodes.overview: Singing, speeches and stories galore! Join everyone from Elton John to Brad Pitt, and Nicola Sturgeon to Alex Salmond for this Christmas cracker of a show.
